attributes.action: Deport all foreign criminals and remove citizenship.
attributes.additional_details: Make it law that only people of good character, which is current law is policed and checked properly.  If the contrary is found to be true then they are to be deported immediately.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Deport all foreign criminals with effect immediately.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/705093
